tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback_data (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    date timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE ProductAnalysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_id UUID,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    key_phrases TEXT[],
    aspect_sentiments JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE product_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_rating INT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE product_recommendations (
    recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    recommended_product_id INT,
    recommendation_text TEXT,
    recommendation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerFeedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Product (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  product_category VARCHAR(50),
  launch_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FeedbackSentiment (
  sentiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_id INT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT,
  sentiment_category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Customer (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  email_address VARCHAR(255),
  membership_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ProductFeedbackJoin (
  product_id INT,
  feedback_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (product_id, feedback_id)
)
